projects.description: A Random Quote Generator is a program that displays a randomly selected quote each time the user clicks a button.

List Pagination and Filtering is navigating through a long list of items by displaying a handful of items on one page and provide navigation to jump to a list of more items. Users can also filter by name.

A browser-based, word guessing game: 'Phrase Hunter.'. A player tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard. with limited number of attempts
Created an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API (Application Programming Interface) to display a specific number details.
